# NumberFormatter.PadPosition

**Enumeration**

These constants are used to specify how numbers should be padded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/paddingPosition] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PadPosition
```

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition.beforePrefix**: Specifies that the padding should occur before the prefix.
- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition.afterPrefix**: Specifies that the padding should occur after the prefix.

## Enumeration Cases

- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition.afterSuffix**: Specifies that the padding should occur after the suffix.
- **NumberFormatter.PadPosition.beforeSuffix**: Specifies that the padding should occur before the suffix.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NumberFormatter.Style**: The predefined number format styles used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/numberStyle] property.
- **NumberFormatter.Behavior**: These constants specify the behavior of a number formatter. These constants are returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/defaultFormatterBehavior()] class method and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/formatterBehavior] property.
- **NumberFormatter.RoundingMode**: These constants are used to specify how numbers should be rounded. These constants are used by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/roundingMode-swift.property] property.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
